field.name: operating_company_id
field.lookupobjectsql: select operating_company_id,operating_company_desc from operating_company_lku order by operating_company_desc

field.name: zonestate_id
field.lookupobjectsql: select distinct sl.state_id,sl.description from state_lku sl inner join product_lob_mapping plm on sl.state_id = plm.state_id order by sl.description asc

field.name: zonecompany_id
field.lookupobjectsql: select distinct plm.company_id,cc.description as description from carriercompanies_lku cc inner join product_lob_mapping plm on cc.company_id=plm.company_id where state_id = #zonestate_id# order by description asc

field.name: zonelob_id
field.lookupobjectsql: select distinct plm.lob_id,ll.description from lob_lku ll inner join product_lob_mapping plm on ll.lob_id=plm.lob_id where state_id = #zonestate_id# and company_id = #zonecompany_id# order by description asc

field.name: zonebusiness_segment_code
field.lookupobjectsql: select distinct plm.business_segment_code,bs.business_segment_name from business_segment bs inner join product_lob_mapping plm on bs.business_segment_code = plm.business_segment_code where state_id = #zonestate_id# and company_id = #zonecompany_id# and lob_id = #zonelob_id# order by business_segment_name asc

field.name: zoneCarrier_group
field.lookupobjectsql: select distinct cgl.carrier_group_id,carrier_group_desc from carrier_group_lku cgl inner join product_lob_mapping plm on cgl.carrier_group_id = plm.carrier_group_id and plm.state_id = #zonestate_id# order by cgl.carrier_group_desc asc

field.name: uwstate_id
field.lookupobjectsql: select distinct sl.state_id,sl.description from state_lku sl inner join product_lob_mapping plm on sl.state_id = plm.state_id order by sl.description asc

field.name: uwcompany_id
field.lookupobjectsql: select distinct plm.company_id,cc.description as description from carriercompanies_lku cc inner join product_lob_mapping plm on cc.company_id=plm.company_id where state_id = #uwstate_id# order by description asc

field.name: uwlob_id
field.lookupobjectsql: select distinct plm.lob_id,ll.description from lob_lku ll inner join product_lob_mapping plm on ll.lob_id=plm.lob_id where state_id = #uwstate_id# and company_id = #uwcompany_id# order by description asc

field.name: uwbusiness_segment_code
field.lookupobjectsql: select distinct plm.business_segment_code,bs.business_segment_name from business_segment bs inner join product_lob_mapping plm on bs.business_segment_code = plm.business_segment_code where state_id = #uwstate_id# and company_id = #uwcompany_id# and lob_id = #uwlob_id# order by business_segment_name asc

field.name: uwcarrier_group
field.lookupobjectsql: select distinct cgl.carrier_group_id as uwcarrier_group_id,carrier_group_desc as uwcarrier_group_desc from carrier_group_lku cgl inner join product_lob_mapping plm on cgl.carrier_group_id = plm.carrier_group_id and plm.state_id = #uwstate_id# order by cgl.carrier_group_desc asc

databaseoperation.name: getSubProducer
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select producer_number,subproducer_indicator as 'subproducer_indicator1',subproducer_indicator as 'subproducer_indicator2', producer_status_cde as 'old_producer_status_cde' ,producer_status_cde as 'producer_status_cde_session',subproducer_indicator as 'subproducer_indicator_closed' from producer_number where producer_number_id=#producer_number_id#

databaseoperation.name: getSubProducer1
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select producer_number,subproducer_indicator as 'subproducer_indicator1',subproducer_indicator as 'subproducer_indicator2', producer_status_cde as 'old_producer_status_cde' ,subproducer_indicator as 'subproducer_indicator_closed' from producer_number where producer_number_id=#producer_number_id#

databaseoperation.name: getParentProducerNumberId
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select producer_number_id as 'parent_producer_number_id' from producer_number where producer_number=#parent_producer_number#

databaseoperation.name: insertDownPaymentPercentage
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: update producer_number set down_payment_percentage = #down_payment_percentage# where agency_id = #agency_id# and producer_number_id = #producer_number_id#

databaseoperation.name: insertMgaCode
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: update producer_number set producer_mga_code = #producer_mga_code# where agency_id = #agency_id# and producer_number_id = #producer_number_id#

databaseoperation.sqlstmt: update producer_number set producer_mga_code = #producer_mga_code# where agency_id = #agency_id# and producer_number_id = #producer_number_id#

databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select producer_number,subproducer_indicator as 'subproducer_indicator1',subproducer_indicator as 'subproducer_indicator2', producer_status_cde as 'old_producer_status_cde' ,producer_status_cde as 'producer_status_cde_session',subproducer_indicator as 'subproducer_indicator_closed' from producer_number where producer_number_id=#producer_number_id#

databaseoperation.name: getParentProducerNumberId
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select producer_number_id as 'parent_producer_number_id' from producer_number where producer_number=#parent_producer_number#

databaseoperation.name: insertDownPaymentPercentage
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: update producer_number set down_payment_percentage = #down_payment_percentage# where agency_id = #agency_id# and producer_number_id = #producer_number_id#

databaseoperation.name: getParentProducerNumberId
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select producer_number_id as 'parent_producer_number_id' from producer_number where producer_number=#parent_producer_number#

databaseoperation.name: getParentProducerNumberId
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select producer_number_id as 'parent_producer_number_id' from producer_number where producer_number=#parent_producer_number#

databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select producer_number,subproducer_indicator as 'subproducer_indicator1',subproducer_indicator as 'subproducer_indicator2', producer_status_cde as 'old_producer_status_cde' ,producer_status_cde as 'producer_status_cde_session',subproducer_indicator as 'subproducer_indicator_closed' from producer_number where producer_number_id=#producer_number_id#

databaseoperation.name: getSubProducer1
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select producer_number,subproducer_indicator as 'subproducer_indicator1',subproducer_indicator as 'subproducer_indicator2', producer_status_cde as 'old_producer_status_cde' ,subproducer_indicator as 'subproducer_indicator_closed' from producer_number where producer_number_id=#producer_number_id#

databaseoperation.name: insertDownPaymentPercentage
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: update producer_number set down_payment_percentage = #down_payment_percentage# where agency_id = #agency_id# and producer_number_id = #producer_number_id#

databaseoperation.name: getProducerNumberForId
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select producer_number as 'producerNumber' from producer_number where producer_number_id=#producer_number_id#

databaseoperation.name: getParentBrokerCode
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select producer_number as 'parent_producer_number' from producer_number where producer_number_id=#parent_producer_id#

databaseoperation.name: getProducerNumberBranch
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select top 1 branch_id from Producer_Number_Branch where producer_number_id=#producer_number_id#

databaseoperation.name: getProducerNumberUnderWriter
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select top 1 team_id from product_underwriter where producer_number_id=#producer_number_id#

databaseoperation.name: getProducerNumberSalesRepresentative
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select top 1 sales_representative_id as filter_sales_representative_id from Producer_Number_Salesrepresentative where producer_number_id=#producer_number_id#

databaseoperation.name: getVendorTypeRecord
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select top 1 * from address where producer_number_id=#producer_number_id# and type=4 and agency_id = #agency_id#

databaseoperation.name: getVendorTypeRecord
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select top 1 * from address where producer_number_id=#producer_number_id# and type=4 and agency_id =#agency_id#

databaseoperation.name: getProducerNumberSalesRepresentative
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select top 1 sales_representative_id as filter_sales_representative_id from Producer_Number_Salesrepresentative where producer_number_id=#producer_number_id#

databaseoperation.name: getProducerNumberUnderWriter
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select top 1 team_id from product_underwriter where producer_number_id=#producer_number_id#

databaseoperation.name: getProducerNumberBranch
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select top 1 branch_id from Producer_Number_Branch where producer_number_id=#producer_number_id#

databaseoperation.name: getParentBrokerCode
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select producer_number as 'parent_producer_number' from producer_number where producer_number_id=#parent_producer_id#

databaseoperation.name: getSubProducer
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select producer_number,subproducer_indicator as 'subproducer_indicator1',subproducer_indicator as 'subproducer_indicator2', producer_status_cde as 'old_producer_status_cde' ,producer_status_cde as 'producer_status_cde_session', subproducer_indicator as 'subproducer_indicator_closed' from producer_number where producer_number_id=#producer_number_id#

databaseoperation.name: getAddressDetailsForContact
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select top 1 phone as bank_contact_phone, extn as bank_contact_extn, e_mail as bank_contact_email from address where type = #AgentAddresType# and is_primary =1 and person_id = #bank_contact_name#

databaseoperation.name: getEffectiveNExpireDatesFromProducerNumber
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: Select effective_new_date,effective_renew_date,expire_new_date,expire_renew_date from producer_number where producer_number_id=#producer_number_id#

databaseoperation.name: getSubProducerStatusForCrossReference
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select producer_status_cde as 'producer_status_cde_temp' from producer_number where producer_number_id=#producer_number_id#

databaseoperation.name: getProducerNumberStatus
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select producer_status_cde as producer_status_cde_db,commission_reduction_date from producer_number where producer_number_id = #producer_number_id#

databaseoperation.name: getAgencyStatus
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select is_active from agency_master where agency_id=#agency_id#

databaseoperation.name: getDownPaymentPercentage
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select down_payment_percentage from producer_number where agency_id = #agency_id# and producer_number_id = #producer_number_id#

databaseoperation.name: getAgencyType
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select Entity_Type_General_Detail,master_lookup_data_desc as entityTypeGeneralDetailsDescForMandatoryAsterisk from agency_master am left join master_lookup_data_lku mld on am.Entity_Type_General_Detail = mld.master_lookup_data_id and master_lookup_detail_id in (select master_lookup_detail_id from master_lookup_detail_lku where master_lookup_detail_desc= 'agency_category_lku') where agency_id = #agency_id#

databaseoperation.name: getStateCodeToGenerateProducerNumber
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select domicile_state ,sl.abbreviation, case when sl.abbreviation like 'AZ' then '2' when sl.abbreviation like 'CA' then '4' when sl.abbreviation like 'NV' then '7' when sl.abbreviation like 'UT' then '3' else '0' end as stateAppend from agency_master am inner join state_lku sl on sl.state_id = am.domicile_state where am.agency_id=#agency_id#

databaseoperation.name: getOperatingDivisionAndTypeOfCode
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select top 1 Operating_division_id,type_of_code_id from producer_number where producer_number = #parent_producer_number1#

databaseoperation.name: getOperatingDivisionAndTypeOfCodeOnSubProducerClick
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select top 1 Operating_division_id,type_of_code_id,type_of_code_other from producer_number where producer_number = #producer_number#

databaseoperation.name: getTypeOfCodeIdAndOperatingDivision
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select top 1 x.master_lookup_data_id,master_lookup_data_id as type_of_code_id, null as Operating_division_id from dbo.master_lookup_data_lku x inner join dbo.master_lookup_detail_lku y on x.master_lookup_detail_id = y.master_lookup_detail_id where y.lookup_table_name = 'agency_code_type_of_code_lku' and x.master_lookup_data_desc = #default_type_of_code#

databaseoperation.name: getEffectiveDatesForSubproducerIndicatorChecked
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: Select effective_new_date,effective_renew_date,expire_new_date,expire_renew_date from producer_number where producer_number_id=#producer_number_id#

databaseoperation.name: getClosedReasonOther
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select master_lookup_data_code as custom_reason_code from master_lookup_data_lku where master_lookup_data_id =#closed_reason_code_id#

databaseoperation.name: fetchPaymentPlanCode
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: Select data.master_lookup_data_code as payment_plan_code from master_lookup_data_lku data left join master_lookup_detail_lku master on master.master_lookup_detail_id=data.master_lookup_detail_id where master.master_lookup_detail_code='producer_affinity_payment_plan_lku' and data.master_lookup_data_id=#affinity_group_payment_plan#

databaseoperation.name: fetchPaymentPlanId
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: Select data.master_lookup_data_id as affinity_group_payment_plan,data.master_lookup_data_code as payment_plan_code from master_lookup_data_lku data left join master_lookup_detail_lku master on master.master_lookup_detail_id=data.master_lookup_detail_id where master.master_lookup_detail_code='producer_affinity_payment_plan_lku' and data.master_lookup_data_code=#default_affinity_group_payment_plan_code#

databaseoperation.name: producer_name
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select name as producer_name from agency_master where agency_id = #agency_id#

databaseoperation.name: getStateAbbreviation
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select abbreviation as state_abbreviation from state_lku where state_id = #state_id#

databaseoperation.name: fetchPaymentPlanCode
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: Select data.master_lookup_data_code as payment_plan_code from master_lookup_data_lku data left join master_lookup_detail_lku master on master.master_lookup_detail_id=data.master_lookup_detail_id where master.master_lookup_detail_code='producer_affinity_payment_plan_lku' and data.master_lookup_data_id=#affinity_group_payment_plan#
